Original: 這是一家涼爽、舒適、令人放鬆的清酒吧。我喜歡他們的服務，尤其是老闆Doris和經理Leo。他們非常了解自己的食物和清酒。他們會根據您的喜好推薦清酒。如果不確定自己喜歡什麼，您可以探索不同類型的清酒。一定要記得打電話預約。他們不提供步入式服務。我們很幸運，他們為我們服務。謝謝你們讓我們在台灣度過了兩個美好的夜晚。
EN: This is a cool, comfortable and relaxed bartender bar.I like their services, especially the boss Doris and Manager Leo.They know their food and sake very well.They recommend sake according to your preference.If you are not sure what you like, you can explore different types of sake.Be sure to call for an appointment.They do not provide step -in services.We are lucky and they serve us.Thank you for letting us have two beautiful nights in Taiwan.

Original:
確實是一家專業的清酒酒吧，擁有舒適的內部裝飾和氛圍
特別是你可以嘗試一些零售店裡不常見的小眾清酒品種
與清酒風味相得益彰的食物也是一大亮點
絕對是值得再去的地方
EN:
It is indeed a professional sake bar, with comfortable internal decoration and atmosphere
Especially you can try some uncommon niche sake varieties in retail stores
The food that complements the flavor of the sake is also a highlight
Definitely worth going

Original:
我注意到這個地方有我最喜歡的清酒之一（日日），我知道我必須去。

櫃檯座位和沙發可供放鬆的空間，令人放鬆。主人對清酒很了解，會問你平常喜歡喝什麼，並給你一些建議。房東很細心，會根據您的回饋推薦飲品，讓您感覺在這裡受到了很好的照顧。

每杯360台幣，如果總共購買4/8/12個，還有小折扣。

每種清酒都裝在特定的玻璃杯中，以增強風味和香氣。有些眼鏡還提前冷藏，我很欣賞對細節的關注！

我們3個人一共喝了9杯，每杯清酒都很美味。他們有如此獨特的選擇！我們喝了一杯提前放入冰箱的桂花高粱酒來結束這個夜晚，以賦予它美妙的口感。真正美味，甜美，花香濃鬱。

我希望我附近有一家這麼好的酒吧，我希望很快就能回來！
EN:
I noticed that there is one of my favorite sake (day) in this place, I know I must go.

The seats and sofas are relaxed.The owner knows how to clear sake, and will ask you what you like to drink and give you some suggestions.The landlord is very careful that you will recommend drinking drinks according to your feedback, so that you feel that you have been taken well here.

360 Taiwan dollars per cup, if you buy 4/8/12 in total, there are small discounts.

Each sake is installed in a specific glass to enhance the flavor and aroma.Some glasses are refrigerated in advance, I appreciate the attention of details!

Our three people drank a total of 9 cups, and each cup of sake was delicious.They have such a unique choice!We drank a cup of osmanthus sorghum wine in the refrigerator in advance to end this night to give it a wonderful taste.It's really delicious, sweet, and rich in floral.

I hope there is such a good bar near me, and I hope I will be back soon!

Original: 超級涼爽可愛的小地方，提供高級街頭美食和優雅的清酒！工作人員超級友好和熱情！非常適合在漫長的一天工作後吃點東西和喝點飲料！我想說的是治療經驗！ 🤗 …
EN: Super cool and lovely small places, provide high -end street food and elegant sake!Staff is super friendly and enthusiastic!It is very suitable for eating something and drinking after a long day of work!What I want to say is treatment experience!🤗 🤗 ...

Original:
這顆隱藏的寶石隱藏在迷人的台北小巷中。店主多麗絲（Doris）是一位經過認證的清酒“侍酒師”，是一位出色的女主人，知識淵博且友善。

我和我女朋友根據我們的個人喜好提供了清酒：我們都很喜歡。當我們告訴多麗絲我的女朋友喜歡杜松子酒時，她拿出了一瓶漂亮的酒，我們在房子裡喝了兩輪。 100% 一次難忘的經驗。

價格也很合理：我們的4杯高級清酒總共1800元台幣。
EN:
This hidden gem was hidden in the charming Taipei alley.Doris, the owner, is a certified sake "sommelier". He is an excellent hostess, knowledgeable and friendly.

My girlfriend and I provide sake based on our personal preferences: we all like it.When we told Doris my girlfriend like Du Songzi wine, she took out a bottle of beautiful wine and we drank two rounds in the house.100% an unforgettable experience.

The price is also very reasonable: our 4 cups of senior sake of sake a total of 1,800 Taiwan dollars.

Original: 非常好喝每一瓶酒都很好喝，老闆店長都非常有心，每瓶灑都有他的故事，每道菜都有故事，真的很有❤️
EN: Very delicious every bottle of wine is delicious. The owner's manager is very intentional. Each bottle has his story. Each dish has a story.
